scripts.build: babel --presets react,es2015 src/source -d src/build && browserify src/build/App.js -o js/bundle.js && cleancss src/source/*.css src/source/components/*.css -o css/bundle.css
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && mkdir -p build/js && uglifyjs js/bundle.js > build/js/bundle.js && cleancss src/source/*.css src/source/components/*.css -o build/css/bundle.css
